title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Amazon Fulfillment Center Operations with Generative AI (IND393)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI自动化亚马逊履行中心运营 (IND393)
abstract: Discover how Amazon improved fulfillment center launches by building a computer vision solution using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon Nova Pro and Anthropic Claude models. In this session, we discuss architectural decisions that enable automated image detection at scale, reducing verification time by over 60%. We explore our journey from concept to deployment, sharing learnings on rapid prototyping, experimentation, and on-site pilot testing. Join this session to learn about practical approaches to optimize performance, resilience, and cost, and how you can apply these practices in building your own operational readiness solution.
abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊如何使用 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon Nova Pro 和 Anthropic Claude 模型构建计算机视觉解决方案，从而改进履行中心的启动流程。在本次会议中，我们将讨论能够实现大规模自动化图像检测的架构决策，将验证时间缩短了 60% 以上。我们将探讨从概念到部署的整个过程，分享在快速原型设计、实验和现场试点测试方面的经验教训。参加本次会议，了解优化性能、弹性和成本的实用方法，以及如何将这些实践应用于构建您自己的运营就绪解决方案。

presenter.name: Joseph Rosing
presenter.title: Head of Manufacturing & Supply Chain CoE
